stock_detail_financial_text_part1: In {year}, {company}'s revenue was {revenue}, {direction} of {changePercent}% compared to the previous year's {prevRevenue}.
stock_detail_analyst_forecast_text: According to {numAnalysts} analyst ratings, the average rating for {ticker} stock is "{rating}". The 12-month stock price forecast is {priceTarget}, which is {direction} of {upside}% from the latest price.
stock_detail_news_no_articles: No articles found for this stock.
stock_detail_news_no_videos: No videos found for this stock.
stock_detail_earnings_scheduled: {company} is scheduled to release its earnings on
stock_detail_quarterly_earnings_released: {company} has released their quarterly earnings on {date}:
stock_detail_alert_notify_text: Your price alert will notify you when the stock price is {condition} {targetPrice}.
stock_detail_target_price_error: Target Price must be above zero
stock_detail_export_intraday_desc: Choose a custom date range for intraday data. This export can take 2-3 minutes. Keep this tab open and the download will start automatically.
stock_detail_plus_pro_only: Available for Plus and Pro only.
stock_detail_export_sign_in_error: Sign in to export intraday data.
stock_detail_export_upgrade_error: Upgrade to Plus or Pro to export intraday data.
stock_detail_export_date_error: Select a start and end date.
stock_detail_export_date_range_error: Start date must be on or before end date.
stock_detail_export_generating: Generating export. This can take 2-3 minutes.
stock_detail_financials_peaked_at: {label} peaked at {highest} in {highDate} and hit its lowest at {lowest} in {lowDate}.
stock_detail_ai_disclaimer: This analysis was generated by AI and may not capture all nuances from the financial statements. Please review the full financial data for complete information.
stock_detail_ai_subscription_required: This feature requires a Plus or Pro subscription.
stock_detail_ai_insufficient_credits: Insufficient credits. You have {credits} credits. This summary costs 3 credits.
stock_detail_stats_no_data: No statistical data available right now.
stock_detail_stats_sources: Sources: Historical revenue is based on company filings submitted to the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC). The most recent revenue numbers may be taken from company press releases.
stock_detail_stats_upgrade_desc: Upgrade now for unlimited access to all data, tools and no ads.
stock_detail_stats_earnings_surprise_des: Earnings Surprise occurs when a company's reported earnings per share (EPS) differ from analysts' expectations. A positive surprise (better than expected) often drives the stock price higher, while a negative surprise (worse than expected) can lead to declines.
stock_detail_stats_price_reaction_info: This table provides an overview of how a stock's price historically reacted around earnings reports. It displays key metrics like price changes over specific timeframes and Relative Strength Index (RSI).
stock_detail_stats_in_last_12_months: In the last 12 months, {company} had revenue of {revenue} and earned {earnings} in profits. Earnings per share was {eps}.
stock_detail_stats_shares_outstanding: {company} has {shares} shares outstanding. The shares have a market value of {marketCap}.
stock_detail_stats_short_selling: Short interest in {company} is {shortInterest}% of the outstanding shares, representing {sharesShort} shares. The short ratio is {shortRatio}.
stock_detail_stats_pe_ratio: The stock has a PE ratio of {peRatio}, meaning that every $1 in earnings is currently priced at ${peRatio} in the stock market.
stock_detail_stats_enterprise_value_text: The enterprise value is {enterpriseValue}. Enterprise value adds debt and subtracts cash from the company's market cap, providing an alternative valuation for the company.
stock_detail_stats_financial_position_te: {company}'s current ratio is {currentRatio}. A current ratio above 1 means that the company has enough short-term assets to cover its short-term liabilities.
stock_detail_stats_roe_text: Return on Equity is {roe}%, and return on invested capital is {roic}%.
stock_detail_stats_stock_price_text: The stock price has increased by {changePercent}% in the past year.
stock_detail_stats_revenue_text: {company}'s revenue is {revenue}. Revenue has increased {revenueChange}% over the past year.
stock_detail_stats_balance_sheet_text: {company} has {cash} in cash on the balance sheet. Total assets are {totalAssets}, and total liabilities are {totalLiabilities}.
stock_detail_stats_cash_flow_text: {company}'s operating cash flow was {operatingCashFlow} over the trailing twelve months.
stock_detail_stats_margins_text: {company}'s gross profit margin was {grossMargin}%, while its operating and net profit margins were {operatingMargin}% and {netMargin}%, respectively.
stock_detail_stats_dividend_text: {company} pays an annual dividend of ${annualDividend}, which amounts to a dividend yield of {dividendYield}%.
stock_detail_stats_analyst_text: According to {numAnalysts} stock analysts, the average 12-month price target for {company} is ${priceTarget}. The average analyst rating is "{rating}".
stock_detail_stats_fair_value_text: There are several formulas that can be used to estimate the fair value of a stock. Discounted cash flow analysis (DCF) returns a fair value estimate of ${dcf}.
stock_detail_stats_stock_split_text: The most recent stock split was a {splitType} {splitRatio} split that occurred on {splitDate}.
stock_detail_stats_market_cap_infobox: {company} has a market cap or net worth of {marketCap} as of {date}. Its market cap has {changeDirection} by {changePercent}% in one year.
stock_detail_stats_short_interest_infobo: {company} has a total short interest of {shortInterest}. Its short interest has {changeDirection} by {changePercent}% to the previous month.
stock_detail_stats_revenue_infobox: {company} reported an annual revenue of {annualRevenue}, reflecting a {growthPercent}% growth. For the quarter ending {quarterDate}, {company} generated {quarterRevenue} in revenue.
stock_detail_stats_market_cap_definition: Market capitalization, also called net worth, is the total value of all of a company's outstanding shares. It is calculated by multiplying the stock price by the number of shares outstanding.
stock_detail_stats_market_cap_formula: Formula: Market Cap = Stock Price * Shares Outstanding
stock_detail_stats_short_interest_defini: Short interest is the total number of a company's shares that have been sold short but not yet covered or closed out. It reflects how many shares investors have borrowed and sold in anticipation of a price decline.
stock_detail_stats_short_interest_formul: Formula: Short Interest = Total Shares Sold Short and Still Outstanding
stock_detail_stats_revenue_definition: Revenue, also called sales, is the amount of money a company receives from its business activities, such as sales of products or services. Revenue does not take any expenses into account and is therefore different from profits.
stock_detail_stats_ftd_definition: A fail-to-deliver occurs when securities sold are not delivered to the buyer by the agreed settlement date. FTD metrics help traders identify market stress and elevated short interestâ€”sudden spikes may presage short squeezes or liquidity bottlenecks.
stock_detail_stats_overview_seo_descript: Detailed statistics for {company} ({ticker}) stock, including valuation, metrics, financial numbers, share information and more.
stock_detail_stats_market_cap_seo_title: {company} ({ticker}) Market Cap Analysis | Historical Valuation & Growth Trends
stock_detail_stats_market_cap_seo_descri: Comprehensive market capitalization analysis for {company} ({ticker}). Track historical market cap trends, valuation growth, size classification, and year-over-year changes with detailed charts and quarterly data.
stock_detail_stats_market_cap_seo_keywor: {ticker} market cap, {company} market capitalization, company valuation, {ticker} net worth, market cap history, valuation trends, company size analysis, {ticker} enterprise value, market cap growth
stock_detail_stats_market_cap_structured: Professional market capitalization tracking and valuation analysis for {company} ({ticker})
stock_detail_stats_short_interest_seo_ti: {company} ({ticker}) Short Interest Analysis | Historical Data & Squeeze Indicators
stock_detail_stats_short_interest_seo_de: Comprehensive short interest analysis for {company} ({ticker}). Track short position changes, days to cover, short ratio, float percentage, and historical trends. Advanced short squeeze detection and bearish sentiment analysis tools.
stock_detail_stats_short_interest_seo_ke: {ticker} short interest, {company} short squeeze, days to cover, short float percentage, {ticker} short ratio, short position analysis, short interest history, bearish sentiment analysis, squeeze indicators
stock_detail_stats_short_interest_struct: Professional short interest tracking and squeeze analysis for {company} ({ticker})

stock_detail_stats_revenue_seo_descripti: Comprehensive revenue analysis for {company} ({ticker}). Track historical sales performance, revenue growth trends, quarterly revenue data, and year-over-year comparisons with detailed financial insights and charts.
stock_detail_stats_revenue_seo_keywords: {ticker} revenue analysis, {company} sales performance, revenue growth trends, {ticker} quarterly revenue, historical sales data, revenue growth rate, {ticker} sales trends, company revenue history
stock_detail_stats_revenue_structured_de: Professional revenue tracking and sales performance analysis for {company} ({ticker})
stock_detail_stats_ftd_seo_title: {company} ({ticker}) Fail-to-Deliver (FTD) Analysis | Settlement Risk & Short Interest
stock_detail_stats_ftd_seo_description: Comprehensive fail-to-deliver (FTD) analysis for {company} ({ticker}). Track settlement failures, delivery issues, and potential short squeeze indicators with historical FTD data and volume ratios for informed trading decisions.
stock_detail_stats_ftd_seo_keywords: {ticker} fail to deliver, {company} FTD analysis, settlement failures, delivery issues, {ticker} FTD shares, short squeeze indicators, settlement risk analysis, fail to deliver data, FTD volume ratio
stock_detail_stats_ftd_structured_desc: Professional fail-to-deliver tracking and analysis for {company} ({ticker})
stock_detail_stats_earnings_seo_title: {company} ({ticker}) Earnings Surprise Analysis | EPS & Revenue Impact
stock_detail_stats_earnings_seo_descript: In-depth analysis of earnings surprises for {company} ({ticker}), tracking EPS and revenue beats or misses. Explore historical earnings impact on stock price and performance trends.
stock_detail_stats_earnings_seo_keywords: {ticker} earnings surprise, {company} EPS surprise, revenue surprise, earnings analysis, historical stock price, EPS beats, revenue beats
stock_detail_stats_earnings_structured_d: Detailed tracking of EPS and revenue surprises for {company} ({ticker}), with historical stock price reactions and performance insights.
stock_detail_stats_price_reaction_seo_ti: {company} ({ticker}) Earnings Price Reaction | Historical Impact & Volatility Analysis
stock_detail_stats_price_reaction_seo_de: Advanced earnings price reaction analysis for {company} ({ticker}). Track historical stock performance around earnings releases, volatility impact, EPS beats, and post-earnings trends for strategic trading insights.
stock_detail_stats_price_reaction_seo_ke: {ticker} earnings reaction, {company} earnings impact, stock price reaction earnings, earnings volatility analysis, {ticker} EPS beats, earnings surprise impact, post earnings drift, earnings trading strategy
stock_detail_stats_price_reaction_struct: Professional earnings impact analysis and price reaction tracking for {company} ({ticker})
